about_the_game:
Add-on for Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii that allows you to customize your pirate ship with parts featuring designs inspired by legendary characters like Kazuma Kiryu, Ichiban Kasuga, and more.

■ KAZUMA KIRYU SPECIAL SHIP CUSTOMIZATION SET
- Sail: Kazuma Kiryu
- Sail: Dragon
- Sail: Dragon of Dojima
- Figurehead: Kazuma Kiryu Statue
- Hull: Dragon
- Ornament: Dragon

■ ICHIBAN KASUGA SPECIAL SHIP CUSTOMIZATION SET
- Sail: Ichiban Kasuga
- Sail: Dragonfish
- Sail: Legendary Hero
- Figurehead: Ichiban Kasuga Statue
- Hull: Dragonfish
- Ornament: Dragonfish

■ DAIGO DOJIMA SPECIAL SHIP CUSTOMIZATION SET
- Sail: Daigo Dojima
- Sail: Fudo Myo-o
- Sail: Tojo Clan Crest
- Figurehead: Daigo Dojima Statue
- Hull: Fudo Myo-o
- Ornament: Tojo Clan

■ RGG STUDIO SPECIAL SHIP CUSTOMIZATION SET
- Sail: RGG Studio Logo
- Sail: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth (Japan Version)
- Sail: Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii
- Sail: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth
- Figurehead: RGG Studio
- Hull: RGG Studio
- Ornament: RGG Studio

*You must own a copy of Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii in order to use this add-on content. Please update the game by downloading the latest patch and updating before using it.
*Please be aware that the additional content included in this pack is also sold in separate sets or editions.
*The “Ship Customizaton Pack” will be available after the main character's pirate ship upgrade event in Chapter 2 of the main game.
*The contents of the "Ship Customizaton Pack" will not be counted toward in-game achievements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 1909 (Build18363.1350)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470,3.2GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 1200, 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650,4GB or AMD Radeon RX 560,4GB or Intel Arc A380,6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: 1080p Low@30FPS w/Balanced FSR1.0,requires a CPU with supports the AVX and SSE4.2 instruction set
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 1909 (Build18363.1350)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790,3.6GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600, 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060,6GB or AMD Radeon RX 5700,8GB or Intel Arc A750,8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: 1080p High@60FPS w/o FSR , requires a CPU with supports the AVX and SSE4.2 instruction set, SSD recommended
